titleStmt.title: An advertisement from the Society of Chymical Physitians, touching medicines by them prepared, in pursuance of his Majesties command, for the prevention, and for the cure of the plague

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for John Starkey, and are to be sold at his shop at the Mitre near Temple-Bar,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop at the Mitre near Temple-Bar
